user_question: How has the digital divide affected education in rural areas during the COVID-19 pandemic?
final_answer: The digital divide has significantly impacted education in rural areas during the COVID-19 pandemic by limiting access to online learning resources, causing disparities in educational outcomes, and increasing the dropout rates due to lack of internet access and digital devices.
